title: Calories in Dunkin' Donuts Munchkins
meta_description: Discover calories in munchkins dunkin donuts, including per Munchkin nutrition facts like carbs, fat, protein, and serving tweaks for your order.
assumptions: Standard glazed variety; based on official Dunkin' Donuts data for one Munchkin (about 14g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, location, and preparation; check Dunkin' app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Dunkin' Donuts glazed Munchkin contains about 60 calories.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Dunkin' packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Dunkin' Munchkin?
faqs.a: About 60 calories for a standard glazed Munchkin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Munchkins Dunkin Donuts?
faqs.a: Around 7.5 g carbs per glazed Munchkin, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in a dozen Dunkin' Munchkins?
faqs.a: Approximately 720 calories for 12 glazed Munchkins; varies by flavor.

faqs.q: Are Dunkin' Munchkins high in fat?
faqs.a: One has 3 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated; moderation recommended.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Munchkins Dunkin Donuts?
faqs.a: Glazed: 60 kcal; chocolate or filled options add 5â€“20 kcal per Munchkin.
